main event: A civilian in Thousand, Oklahoma reported a UFO sighting on February 25, 1952 at 11:00 AM local time.
interesting points: The object was observed visually on the ground and on ground radar.
It was also visually observed from the air, and an intercept rider was sent.
The object was described as traveling outward, falling into a pond at a 45-degree trajectory, and then splashing downward.
Despite a search of the area, no evidence of the object was found.
The witness is referred to as 'Peanuts.'
sighted object: unidentified object falling into a pond
